welcome_message_body: Welcome to Shagamu, Nigeria! Get ready to experience the charm of this historic city, known for its rich culture and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Shagamu has to offer.

restaurants.name: Right Options
restaurants.description: Right Options is a cafeteria located in Sagamu.
restaurants.address: 6 Akarigbo Street, Isale Oko, Sagamu, Ogun State

restaurants.name: Mr Bigg’s
restaurants.description: Mr Bigg’s is a fast food restaurant located in Sagamu.

restaurants.name: Sharp Corner Restaurant
restaurants.description: Sharp Corner Restaurant is a african restaurant located in Sagamu.

restaurants.name: The Place
restaurants.description: The Place is a pizzeria located in the city.

restaurants.name: Chinês
restaurants.description: Chinês is a sri lankan restaurant located in the city.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all international flights at Murtala Muhammed Airport.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic flights at Murtala Muhammed Airport.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be slow or unreliable at times.
